mapper.sql: id, is_total, screening_notice_id, screening_task_id, district_id, vision_label0_numbers, vision_label0_ratio, vision_label1_numbers, vision_label1_ratio, vision_label2_numbers, vision_label2_ratio, vision_label3_numbers, vision_label3_ratio, key_warning_numbers, student_numbers, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO m_district_attentive_objects_statistic (is_total, screening_notice_id, screening_task_id, district_id, vision_label0_numbers, vision_label0_ratio, vision_label1_numbers, vision_label1_ratio, vision_label2_numbers, vision_label2_ratio, vision_label3_numbers, vision_label3_ratio, key_warning_numbers, student_numbers) VALUES
(#{entity.isTotal}, #{entity.screeningNoticeId}, #{entity.screeningTaskId}, #{entity.districtId}, #{entity.visionLabel0Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel0Ratio}, #{entity.visionLabel1Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel1Ratio}, #{entity.visionLabel2Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel2Ratio}, #{entity.visionLabel3Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel3Ratio}, #{entity.keyWarningNumbers}, #{entity.studentNumbers})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE vision_label0_numbers=values(vision_label0_numbers),vision_label0_ratio=values(vision_label0_ratio), vision_label1_numbers=values(vision_label1_numbers),vision_label1_ratio=values(vision_label1_ratio), vision_label2_numbers=values(vision_label2_numbers),vision_label2_ratio=values(vision_label2_ratio), vision_label3_numbers=values(vision_label3_numbers),vision_label3_ratio=values(vision_label3_ratio), key_warning_numbers=values(key_warning_numbers),student_numbers=values(student_numbers), update_time = now()
